title: One Piece: Water 7/Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: Two Piece Podcast
description: Comprehensive review of the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs, discussing better animation, powerful foes, and the emotional impact of these interconnected story arcs.

title: One Piece Episodes: 323-325 End of the Water 7 Arc
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast

title: One Piece: Water 7 Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: Comprehensive review highlighting that the Water 7 arc is not only a phenomenal story, but sets up the next arc perfectly. Praises Franky's backstory, excellent worldbuilding, and calls the Usopp/Luffy fight one of the highlights of the show.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 Arc

title: One Piece | Water 7 Saga | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: Describes the Water 7 Saga as not just one of the greatest arcs in the One Piece anime, but one of the most legendary sagas in all of anime, considered by many fans the pinnacle of the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 Saga including Enies Lobby
